content: the watercolor shawl is a beginner crochet triangle shawl pattern materials needed * worsted weight yarn in the color of your choice 688 yards * crochet hooks size j or size needed to obtain gauge * tapestry needle * two optional stitch markers pattern is written in english using standard u s crochet terms level beginner the pattern is available for free on my blog the benefit of purchasing this pdf pattern is to receive an ad-free version that is easy to print and read if you have any questions while you are working on your project please feel free to email me at crafting pattern@gmail com and i will do my best to answer your questions and give you help for more crochet project ideas please visit craftingeachday com © 2022 crafting each day do not copy sell or reproduce this pattern without my permission feel free to sell finished items made using this pattern with a credit line for the pattern and a link to my website at craftingeachday com
